caller_intent: Wallace wants to resolve a past insurance bill issue by either setting up paperless billing or paying a small fee to waive a balance.
resolution_steps: Agent explains that Wallace needs to log in to Progressive's website to set up paperless billing but acknowledges his lack of computer skills.
Agent offers to call Progressive to waive a $3 fee if Wallace pays $1 instead of the full balance.
Agent clarifies that the $4 balance stems from losing the paperless discount in the previous term.
Wallace agrees to pay the $1 and provides credit card details for the agent to process the payment.
Agent confirms receipt of credit card information and agrees to call Progressive to handle the payment and send a receipt via email.
summary: Wallace had a $4 balance from a previous insurance term due to losing the paperless discount. The agent offered to waive $3 of the balance if Wallace paid $1, which he agreed to. The agent collected credit card details to process the payment and will follow up with a receipt. The call concluded with the agent committing to resolve the issue.
